name: MACD (12,26,9)
description_short: MACD line, signal, and histogram based on 12/26 EMAs and 9-signal.

name: Price Location vs 20-bar Range
description_short: Normalized position of price in 20-bar high/low range [0,1].

name: Trend Regression Slope (50)
description_short: Slope of linear regression over last 50 bars.

name: Multi-Timeframe Trend Framework
notes_phase2: Consumes several L1/L2 indicators; detailed in Phase 4.

name: Trend Persistence Score v1
description_short: ML-based score of trend persistence over multiple horizons.

name: Momentum Consensus Score v1
description_short: Composite momentum score learned from multiple indicators.

name: Realized Volatility (20)
description_short: Standard deviation of log returns over 20 bars.

name: Bollinger Bands (20, 2σ)
description_short: Upper/middle/lower bands using 20-bar MA and 2σ bands.

name: Bollinger %B (20, 2σ)
description_short: Position of price within Bollinger bands [0,1].

name: Range Expansion Ratio (20)
description_short: Current true range / average true range over 20 bars.

name: Vol of Vol (20)
description_short: Volatility of realized volatility over 20-bar window.

name: On-Balance Volume
description_short: Cumulative volume signed by price direction.

name: VWAP (Intraday)
description_short: Volume-weighted average price during the session.

name: VWAP Deviation
description_short: Price distance from VWAP (absolute and normalized).
notes_phase2: Used for mean-reversion vs trend context.

name: Order Flow Imbalance (20)
description_short: Net signed volume over last 20 bars (if tick/order data).

name: Depth Imbalance (Level 1)
description_short: Bid vs ask depth imbalance at top-of-book.

name: Liquidity Stress Score v1
description_short: Composite liquidity stress indicator using spread, depth, and impact.

name: Swing High (5)
description_short: Flag true when bar is a 5-bar swing high.

name: Swing Low (5)
description_short: Flag true when bar is a 5-bar swing low.

name: HH/HL Structure State v1
description_short: State machine: HH/HL vs LH/LL structure.

name: Structure MTF Framework v1
description_short: Multi-timeframe structure engine with swing tiers.

name: Support/Resistance Zone v1
description_short: Detected support/resistance zones with strength scores.

name: Breakout Flag v1
description_short: Flag when price breaks significant range/level.

name: Market Profile Nodes v1
description_short: High-volume nodes and value areas over chosen windows.

name: Candle Body % of Range
description_short: Body size as fraction of full candle range.

name: Upper Wick % of Range
description_short: Upper wick size as fraction of full range.

name: Lower Wick % of Range
description_short: Lower wick size as fraction of full range.

name: Close Position in Range
description_short: Close point in candle range normalized to [0,1].

name: Basic Candle Pattern Flags v1
description_short: Flags for basic patterns (engulfing, pinbar, doji, etc.).

name: Multi-Candle Pattern v1
description_short: Two- and three-candle pattern flags (e.g. morning star).

name: Candle Embedding v1
description_short: Learned embedding vector of last N candles.

name: Dividend Yield
description_short: Dividend yield as annualized % of price.

name: Fundamental Quality Score v1
description_short: Composite quality factor from multiple fundamentals.

name: Split Event Flag
description_short: True around stock splits or reverse splits.

name: Risk-On/Off State v1
description_short: Simple risk-on/off classification from macro/market indicators.

name: Market Beta (60)
description_short: Rolling beta vs benchmark over 60 bars.

name: 1-Day 95% VaR
description_short: Value-at-Risk estimate for 1-day horizon at 95% confidence.

name: 1-Day 95% ES
description_short: Expected Shortfall for 1-day horizon at 95% confidence.

name: Stress State v1
description_short: Stress indicator from correlations, vol, drawdown.

name: Risk Budget Utilization v1
description_short: Utilization of allotted risk budgets vs policy.
